column6: 2015 at philip hulitar hospice inpatient center in providence surrounded by his loving family. he was the beloved husband of the late angela (gurulyan) shapshapian. born in cairo
column8: the son of the late vahan and satenik (khorozian) shapshapian
column10: armenia before coming to the u. s. in 1979 settling in cranston. john was a jewelry craftsman and worked in the jewelry industry for many years. he was the loving father of aram shapshapian and deanna ayanyan both of cranston; loving grandfather of hagop ayanyan and ani ayanyan; and dear brother of shake arslanian of providence and sonia arslanian of cranston. visiting hours are tuesday from 5 p. m. to 8 p. m. in sts. sahag & mesrob armenian apostolic church
column13: with a funeral service on wednesday at 11 a. m.
column14: followed by burial at north burial ground
